title: The Obsidian Phoenix
description: Crimson and Jerrik are the sole survivors of the merciless slaughter of their people, the elves of the White Forest. Follow them as they seek vengeance and struggle with loss and life changing events. Discover Crimson's true identity and travel with her on her journey to find the Dark One who slaughtered her father and sister. The battle will be bloody, retribution will be hers.
author: A.M. Jandia
